extracted_playbook.title: Disable SmartForward/SmartReply via Email+ Client Settings
extracted_playbook.description: From the email+ client, navigate to settings and disable 'Use smart send'.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which Email+ version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Disable SmartForward/SmartReply via Configuration for Version 3.1.1 and Higher
extracted_playbook.description: Use the 'disabled_features' key and include the value 'smart_send' to disable SmartForward/SmartReply.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable SmartForward/SmartReply via Configuration for Version 2.18 and Higher
extracted_playbook.description: Use the 'enabled_features' key and include the value 'disable_smart_send' to disable SmartForward/SmartReply.
